alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 04 at 1:24AM MST until December 07 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Harrington, Davenport, Othello, Airway Heights, Rosalia, Uniontown, Potlatch, La Crosse, Ephrata, Genesee, Downtown Spokane, Creston, Wilbur, Fairfield, Plummer, Moses Lake, Moscow, Cheney, Odessa, Tekoa, Oakesdale, Ritzville, Rockford, Coulee City, Spokane Valley, Pullman, Quincy, Grand Coulee, and Colfax. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
